answerText: elliptic curve [or EC] [10] The conjecture is defined in terms of a function named for Hasse and Weil designated by this letter. A function designated by this letter and named for Dirichlet is a sum over Dirichlet characters and the reciprocal of n to a particular exponent.
heading: NASAT  |2014 | 13 | 8 | Science | Math | College
subject: Science
question: Question: Answer some questions about the Birch and Swinnerton-Dyer conjecture, for 10 points each.  [10] The conjecture concerns these objects over number fields. These objects have an equation of the form y squared equals x cubed plus a x plus b and were used by Andrew Wiles to prove Fermat's last theorem.
